summary: The cleanest and most realistic looking ENB out there. Features true HDR, costum Weathers, amazing Interiors and much more to be discovered by you!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FieUaB6.jpg?2[/img]
[size=4]
Welcome fellow Skyrim Player!
Have you ever wanted a clean, realistic looking Skyrim?
Have you ever wanted to be amazed by Skyrims beauty no matter where you go?
Then you are in the right place![/size]

[b][size=5]For Additional Information, updates, my modlist, etc, make sure to follow my [url=http://crowclawsskyrim.blogspot.de/]Blog[/url].[/size][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/XtAGpnS.jpg?2[/img]

[size=3][b][u]Installation

[/u][/b]1.Download Files
2.Download the latest ENB archives
3.Copy/Paste the d3d9.dll and the enbhost from the archive into your Skyrim Main Folder, download the [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]enbhelper[/url] and
   Copy/Paste it into your Mainfolder
4.Copy/Paste my files into the same Main Folder, integrate the Data folder into yours
5.Open the enblocal and edit
   ReservedMemorySizeMb=512
   VideoMemorySizeMb=3072
   to your RAM and VRAM
6.Find your SkyrimPrefs.ini (Should be in Documents/mygames/skyrim)
7.Change/add, so it looks like this: 
fGamma=1.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
8.Disable any Antialiasing/Anistropic Filtering of the game itself or forced upon the game by your graphics drivers
9.If you want my look you'll need the mods I'm using, found on my [url=http://crowclawsskyrim.blogspot.de/]Blog[/url].
10.This ENB is NOT compatible with CoT! I don't guarantee compatibility for anything not be found on my Modlist! You are 
     free to experiment and tell me about the results!
11.Enjoy! If you dont, a kitty will cry! And if you make a kitty cry, [/size][url=http://http://dingo.care2.com/pictures/greenliving/uploads/2012/08/303224_130802453684724_326699385_n.jpg][size=3]this guy[/size][/url][size=3] will be mad.[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/XLE6Fqc.jpg?2[/img]

[u][b][size=3]Credits[/size][/b]

[/u][size=3]Tamu75 - Thanks for the TK ENB, which this ENB is based on.
Reddit - Thanks for giving me a reason to publish this.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SQwzJPI.jpg?3[/img]
[/size]
author: CrowClaws
